sentences.sContent: Her knuckles whitened as she gripped the gun.
sentences.sCn: 她紧紧握着枪，指关节都发白了。

synos.tran: 关节；[解剖]指关节；指节；膝关节；肘

phrases.pCn: [口语](笑话等)近乎猥亵的，近乎下流的，近乎粗鄙的

words.tran: 慢速变化球（等于knuckle ball）；弹子（一种游戏）；水压机操作工

trans.tranCn: 关节；指关节；指节；膝关节；肘
trans.tranOther: your knuckles are the joints in your fingers, including the ones where your fingers join your hands
